review: I am very disappointed in this product. I cannot watch a single thing on the netflix app without it having to buffer at least 5 times throughout an episode or movie. When i check my internet connection it says very strong yet randomly it will say no internet connection. Right now my Fire Stick isnt even working because it says it cannot find the device meanwhile i havent touched any wires for it to have all of a sudden changed. I made sure everything was connected correctly but it still will not work. I say spend the money for the Apple TV. All of my roomates have it and they have not had any problems.
